EmailTemplate.name: CorporatePay Revenue Approval Pending
EmailTemplate.subject: Opportunity {!Opportunity.Name} Revenue Approval Pending
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.OwnerFirstName},
It has now been 30 days since you closed opportunity {!Opportunity.Name} and it's forecast revenue has not be approved by the Head Of Relationship Management.
This revenue will not count towards your target until it has been approved.
If you have not done so already, could you please submit the opportunity for approval.
Approval Process Stage - {!Opportunity.Approval_Process_Stage__c}
If there are any issues with this email please contact your Salesforce Administrator
